articles.title: Yakuza Creator Wants Next Game to be Like a Quentin Tarantino Film - IGN
articles.description: Yakuza creator Toshihiro Nagoshi is no stranger to borrowing dramatic themes and high-drama ideas from movies, and now we're learning his first project at Nagoshi Studio is inspired by one of the Hollywood greats: Quentin Tarantino.
